title: TTC - The Modern Political Tradition
description: he Modern Political Tradition: Hobbes to Habermas Course Description: Liberty. Democracy. Rights. Community. The terms and concepts originated by political philosophers have become so ingrained in our global consciousness that politicians and ordinary citizens reference them with frequency and a sense of assuredness. Without even realizing it, we all use the fruits of political philosophy. The question is, are we using them well? Homepage: http://www.thegreatcourses.com/tgc/courses/course_detail.aspx?cid=4750
